room_title: Escape room "North Pole Meltdown" by Escape Artist in Charlotte
review: SO MUCH FUN!!!! I can't wait to go back again! Went with work as a team building exercise and it was awesome! Jared was our guide and he was great! Super helpful, and very friendly! He answered all of our questions and gave us a couple extra clues ;) Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "North Pole Meltdown" by Escape Artist in Charlotte
review: Came in for our work Christmas party and we had a great time. Lots of fun and the staff was very helpful and friendly!!

room_title: Escape room "North Pole Meltdown" by Escape Artist in Charlotte
review: Myself husband and 7 year ole went and did the North Pole escape room. It was very cute room my son loved it but it was HARD! We asked for several hints and still didn't make it out but we had a great time.
